com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUILocalizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUILocalizationHelper

  • public class SCUILocalizationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class for localization. Any application will need to call SCUILocalizationHelper for localization
    which will turn arounds and call the registered implementation of ISCUILocalizationProvider

    SCUILocalizationHelper keeps an instance of ISCUILocalizationProvider mapped to application Id in
    a HashMap.

    An Application can register only one implementation of ISCUILocalizationProvider, an exception will be n
    if an application tries to register more than one implementation of ISCUILocalizationProvider. hyadav
